components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Telecom Egypt Network in Egypt

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS Delivery Delays To Telecom Egypt Network in Egypt. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS Delivery Delays To Telecom Egypt Network in Egypt. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Messaging Logs "Export to CSV" Returns Empty Files

incident_updates.body: Our engineers are investigating the issue where Messaging Logs "Export to CSV" Returns Empty Files. We will be investigating to determine the root cause of the issue and will provide an update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information is available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue where Messaging Logs "Export to CSV" Returns Empty Files. We will be investigating to determine the root cause of the issue and will provide an update in 1 hour, or as soon as more information is available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Viettel Network in Burundi

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Viettel Network in Burundi. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 August 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 14 August 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets when sending via long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 August 2025 at 07:00 PDT until 14 August 2025 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States handsets via subset of United States short codes.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboard visualization partner in the US will be conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, August 16, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time. The maintenance window is expected to last up to two hours. During this time, there may be intermittent failures when loading Insights Historical Dashboards or performing ETL uploads.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to United States and Canada handsets via United States and Canada long codes.

incident_updates.body:
